resources.string:
Next release:
 
 Map:
 · New: Offer a link to download OpenStreetMap offline maps
 · New: Integrate downloaded OpenStreetMap offline map files into c:geo after tapping on them
 · New: Optionally switch between compact and regular icon modes automatically depending on amount of caches displayed
 · Change: Renamed trail / trail history / history trail to history track
 · New: History track: Allow export as GPX track file
 · New: History track: Make max. length configurable
 · New: Load GPX track files and show individual track on map
 · New: Individual routes: Allow sorting of route elements
 · New: Customize history track, circle, individual route and individual track map line colors and widths

Cache list:
 · Change: Difficulty and terrain filter match exact values only, no longer ranges
 · Change: Fast scroll only gets enabled after fling gesture with minimum length

Cache details:
 · Change: Open links in cache description as separate task
 · Fix: Adapt Whereigo URL checker to catch more Whereigo links

Supported geocaching platforms:
 · Change: Set all connectors to https
 · New: Support cache rating and managing of favorites for geocaching.su
 · Fix: Adapt to updated terracaching details URL

System requirements:
 · Change: System requirements: c:geo now requires your system to run at least Android 5.0
 · Change: Set target SDK to 29 to comply with upcoming requirements for Play store
 · New: Internal: Upgraded several included libraries to reflect our new minimum system requirements
 · Fix: Internal: Removed styles / themes workarounds used for older Android versions
 · Fix: Internal: Remove old program code no longer used for supported Android versions

Other changes:
 · Change: New adaptive launcher icon, following the new specs from Play store (also used on mainscreen)
 · New: Add debug view for program settings
 · Fix: Fix for slider preference problem on Android 7
 · Fix: Fix translation issues for several plural forms
 · Fix: Allow restore of settings backup created with c:geo version 2020.03.30 or earlier
 · Fix: Other code cleanup
